name: Conjoined Dimensions
description:
Made by: MattmanXD (me)
Music by: Cratlemungus

This is a small game submitted to GMTK 2021. The theme is Joined together so I have two linked dimensions. You can control both characters, and when Q is pressed spikes will spawn on both sides but the warning will only be on one side. If one of the characters die, then press Q to respawn. You can also play the game in multiplayer with one person controlling each character.
